mapper.insert: insert into ReportBoard (reportId, title, content, writerId, writerName, writerPw, status, assigned, email) values (reportId_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, #{writerPw}, #{status}, #{assigned}, #{email})

insert into ReportBoardFile (fileId, reportId, originalName, savedName, mimeType, fileSize, uploadDate) values (fileId_seq.NEXTVAL, #{reportId}, #{originalName}, #{savedName}, #{mimeType}, #{fileSize}, #{uploadDate})
